title: Запуск
overview: RU.TV presents a show where not only the voice is important!"ZAPUSK" is a reality show about those for whom music is the only way.A bold experiment that will show whether music can overcome loneliness, uncertainty, disappointment.The project team has gathered talented musicians from all over our country. Those who everyone has rejected because they are complex, nervous, and sometimes explosive.They have 9 weeks to prove that their personal pain can become a powerful resource for taking off in a musical career.The most famous artists will decide which of the participants can compete with them on the big stage.The winner will receive one million rubles and a contract with a music label.Only those who cope with their demons will get into the main charts of the country.WHO WILL IT BE? "ZAPUSK" will show!
